entry.title: A website to visualise the results from my master thesis

link.title: A website to visualise the results from my master thesis

entry.content:
Last year, I completed my master’s thesis and subsequently spent the next several months preparing it for publication. This process primarily involved enhancing the content and conducting further analyses that were beyond my initial thesis work, such as examining electricity demand and runoff variability.

Prior to my trip to Laos for the presentation for the Ministry of Energy and Mines, I sought a more intuitive method to present the different scenarios and devoted a few days to developing a Streamlit website for visualization. Check it out: Green Hydrogen Laos
entry.summary: Thesis topic was spatial-temporal optimisation for green hydrogen production

entry.content: In this section  In this episode of the Energy Futures Podcast, Lukas Schirren sits down with Dr. Yousef Alshammari, an award-winning energy analyst and founder of CMarkits, to explore the global changes influencing energy markets. From the impact of COVID-19 and geopolitical events to the evolving roles of fossil fuels and renewables, Dr. Alshammari provides insights into navigating today’s energy challenges and working toward a sustainable future.Tune in to learn about the key forces shaping the energy landscape, the role of natural gas as a transition fuel, and how AI and digitalization are paving the way for energy systems of tomorrow. with timestampsDr. Yousef Alshammari is the founder and CEO of CMarkits, with a background in energy analysis and consulting for OPEC and UNECE.
